articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Spotify will show pricing options outside its iOS app in the EU — if Apple lets it - The Verge
articles.description: Spotify says it will start putting pricing information in the EU version of its app, which comes after a decision from the European Commission blocked Apple’s anti-steering policy for music streaming apps.
articles.content:
Spotify is about to put Apples new App Store policies to the test
